global.Get("document")
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div")
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Get("classList")
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Get("dataset")
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Get("style")
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Call("addEventListener", "click", <callback>)
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Call("addEventListener", "keydown", <callback>)
(expected two added event listeners above)
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Get("classList")
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Get("dataset")
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Get("style")
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Call("removeEventListener", "click", <callback>)
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Call("removeEventListener", "keydown", <callback>)
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Get("classList")
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Get("dataset")
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Get("style")
global.Get("document").Call("createElement", "div").Call("addEventListener", "click", <callback>)
(expected two removed, one added event listeners above)
